data.title: Legislative Liaison
data.text:
24 Wolcott Hill Road

Wethersfield, CT 06109

Phone: (860) 692-7510

Fax: (860) 692-7873

Directions.

Legislative Liaison: David McCluskey

This position serves as a liaison with Connecticut's state government in matters which affect the functioning of the Department of Correction.

Annually this office tracks dozens of proposed legislative bills at the General Assembly, which may impact the Department while also introducing legislation which is necessary for the effective functioning of the agency.

Throughout the year, the Liaison oversees a schedule of correctional facility tours, which offer local and state elected and public safety officials, as well as staff from the State Judicial Branch the opportunity to see the correctional environment first hand.

During the course of an average year responses are provided to more than 700 inquiries from state and local elected officials.
